name: RoboBall
description: RoboBall is a spatial puzzle game based on physics and logical thinking.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: INTEL Celeron,  AMD Athlon X4, Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c capable hardware DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
recommended_requirements: OS: 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia, 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
